title: The Life of Reilly
description: Lynn Reilly has landed her dream job as a schoolteacher onbeautiful Treasure Island. She should be happy as a clam,but someone is keeping her from enjoying her new life. Hernutty aunt Delphine is determined to set her up with her veryeligible (and very cute) neighbor, Reverend Jack Marks.The only problem isâ€¦Delphine is a ghost.A meddling aunt is one thing. A relative stirring up troublefrom the grave is quite another. Especially when Delphine'smatchmaking shenanigans include trickery, humiliation andan alligator named Buster! But with all Delphine's outrageoushaunting high jinks, it looks as if Lynn and Mark won't standa ghost of a chance!
author: Sue Civil-Brown
